scripts.docs: rm -rf ../../docs/python-sdk/* && npm run docs:daytona && npm run docs:workspace && npm run docs:filesystem && npm run docs:git && npm run docs:process && npm run docs:lsp && npm run docs:errors
scripts.docs:daytona: TITLE='Sandbox Management' FIRST_SECTION='Daytona' OUTPUT_FILE='../../docs/python-sdk/daytona.mdx' pydoc-markdown -m daytona_sdk.daytona pydoc-markdown.yml
scripts.docs:filesystem: TITLE='File System Operations' FIRST_SECTION='FileSystem' OUTPUT_FILE='../../docs/python-sdk/file-system.mdx' pydoc-markdown -m daytona_sdk.filesystem pydoc-markdown.yml
scripts.docs:git: TITLE='Git Operations' FIRST_SECTION='Git' OUTPUT_FILE='../../docs/python-sdk/git.mdx' pydoc-markdown -m daytona_sdk.git pydoc-markdown.yml
scripts.docs:process: TITLE='Process and Code Execution' FIRST_SECTION='Process' OUTPUT_FILE='../../docs/python-sdk/process.mdx' pydoc-markdown -m daytona_sdk.common.code_run_params -m daytona_sdk.process pydoc-markdown.yml
scripts.docs:lsp: TITLE='Language Server Protocol' FIRST_SECTION='LspServer' OUTPUT_FILE='../../docs/python-sdk/lsp-server.mdx' pydoc-markdown -m daytona_sdk.lsp_server pydoc-markdown.yml
